activities: etouches operates a web-based meeting and event management system. etouches' customers use the system to gather personal and other information in order to register attendees for their meetings and events. In addition, etouches collects limited personal information on its website in order to respond to sales inquiries.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
